newsitem.title: NIGERIA: Nigerian 45-day T-bonds sell at 9.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: Nigerian 45-day T-bonds sell at 9.6 pct.

text.p: Nigeria's Central Bank said on Wednesday it sold 3,301 million naira worth of 45-day treasury bonds at a weighted average rate of 9.6 percent.
Bids totalled 4,051 million naira and the true yield will be 9.898 percent.
Last week's sales were 6,010 million naira worth of 45-day treasury bonds at a weighted average rate of 9.6 percent.
The central bank also said that on the primary market, 91-day treasury bills worth 7,446 million naira were sold at a marginal rate of 10.0 percent and true yield of 10.25 percent.
It said the bids were worth 10,589 million.
